name: Nail Them All: Hammer
description:
Hammer nails carefully and gently. The task is to hammer as many nails in a row as possible. Put your accuracy to test. Can you get nail 10 nails in a row ?

Features:
- Easy to start
- Challenging
- Addictive
- Relaxed gameplay
- Smooth graphics

Nail them all!

Game by Spooky House Studios
